name: wordpress-com-mcp
description: MCP server providing WordPress.com account and site management tools
long_description: A Model Context Protocol server that provides AI assistants with access to WordPress.com account management, site analytics, content operations, and user profile tools. This extension enables AI assistants to help users manage their WordPress.com sites, analyze site performance, search content, and access account information.

logFile.title: Log File Path
logFile.description: Path where MCP server logs will be saved (leave empty to disable file logging)

tools.name: user_management
tools.description: Access user profile, sites, notifications, and account information

tools.name: site_analytics
tools.description: Retrieve site statistics, performance metrics, and visitor data

tools.name: content_operations
tools.description: Search and retrieve posts, comments, and site content

tools.name: site_administration
tools.description: Manage site settings, plugins, users, and configurations
